pages.text: $(li)Rattlesnakes are little creatures that can be foud in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/dunes)Dunes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/badlands)Badlands$(/l) but sometimes they may hunt other tiny animals.$(br)$(li)If you get close to a Rattlesnake, it is going to make a rattle warning sound.$(br)$(li)If you gets close enought to it, it will attack you with its $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)poison$(/l).

$(li)Rattlesnakes can be bred with any type of meat.$(br)$(li)Rattlesnakes are the favourite prey of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/roadrunner)Roadrunners$(/l).$(br)$(li)Rattlesnakes may drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/rattlesnake_rattle)Rattlesnake Rattle$(/l) upon death.
